metadata.Title: CVE-2017-7480 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: rkhunter versions before 1.4.4 are vulnerable to file download over insecure channel when doing mirror update resulting into potential remote code execution. It was discovered that rkhunter is vulnerable to file download over insecure channel. An attacker could use it for remote code execution.

criterions.comment: rkhunter package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
